laws.full_text:
but growing) group of states that impose a full ban. Minnesota’s law is the first total non-compete ban since Oklahoma banned them in 1890, more than 130 years ago! Hot on the heels of Minnesota, the New York State Assembly passed a non-compete ban on June 20, 2023. That bill is headed to Governor Hochul’s desk, which she is expected to sign. We’ll briefly dive into the details of these new laws.
